color.doc: Your brand's secondary color. Used as the background color for action items. This may be the same as your primary brand color.
color.name: sos_brand_secondary

color.doc: A color that will contrast against your brand colors in order to provide high readability. Used for text on areas where a brand color is used as the background color.
color.name: sos_brand_contrast

color.doc: Used as the primary body text color and also used as a background color for buttons on the Halo UI Agent Container.
color.name: sos_contrast_primary

color.doc: Used as the body background color and also used for the colors of the icons on the Halo UI Agent Container. This is meant to be an inverse shade of the brand contrast color.
color.name: sos_contrast_inverted
